```json
{
  "schema_version": 1,
  "responses": [
    {
      "surface_id": "--blob",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",
        "argv": ["git", "config", "--blob", "HEAD:.gitmodules", "--list"],
        "seed": {
          "files": {
            ".gitmodules": "[submodule \"example\"]\n\tpath = submodules/example\n\turl = https://github.com/example/repo.git"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--edit",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_exclusion",
        "reason_code": "requires_interactive_tty",
        "note": "Requires interactive editor for config file editing"
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--expiry-date",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",
        "argv": ["git", "config", "--expiry-date", "now"]
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--get-regexp",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",
        "argv": ["git", "config", "--get-regexp", "user.*"]
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--global",

        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",

    },
```
